embed.description: What if whenever a themed skin comes out a percentage of the money used to buy the skin is donated towards a charity that has some sort of relation to whatever the themed skin is.

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/B9cma6d5-have-leftover-rp-that-you-get-tired-of-seeing-i-have-a-great-idea-to-get-rid-of-it

This is more likely to happen, they do donations based on skins when they feel like, fact is they don't have to do it on a regular basis but have done it several times in the past.
It's been done before, I'm pretty sure it was the nurse Akali skin that was donated to something.
